price: دەسەڵاتی تکاو لاڵەیان نیە جگە لەو کەسەی بەڵێنی لە خوای میھرەبان وەرگرتووە (وەک پێغەمبەران و شەھیدان)
arabic: لَّا يَمۡلِكُونَ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةَ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَهۡدٗا

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā yamlikūna al-shafāʿata illā mani ittakhadha ʿinda al-raḥmāni ʿahdan
